mapper.insert: insert into sbm_deposit_record(id, tenant_id, building_developer_id, deposit_type, out_credence_id, bank_card_no, init_deposit, deposit, remark, deleted_flag, created_by_id, created_org_id, created_time, updated_by_id, updated_org_id, updated_time, deleted_by_id, deleted_org_id, deleted_time) values (#{id}, #{tenantId}, #{buildingDeveloperId}, #{depositType}, #{outCredenceId}, #{bankCardNo}, #{initDeposit}, #{deposit}, #{remark}, #{deletedFlag, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createdById}, #{createdOrgId}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedById}, #{updatedOrgId}, #{updatedTime}, #{deletedById}, #{deletedOrgId}, #{deletedTime})
